articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chinese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chinese President
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Friday received a congratulatory message from Chinese President Xi Jinping.
					 The message extended the warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 It sincerely wished the Korean people steady and fresh successes in the work of various fields for the state building and development under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship is a precious wealth common to the two countries, it said, adding:
					
					 The Chinese side has the willingness to steadily develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries together with the DPRK side and thus bring well-being to the two countries and the two peoples.
					
					 The message wished the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness and well-being.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Thursday received a congratulatory message from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad.
					 The message extended the wholehearted and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un as regards the fact that the National Defence Commission was replaced by the State Affairs Commission and he was elected chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the friendly DPRK held in Pyongyang on June 29, 2016, wishing him good health and happiness and success in his new important duty as well as the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity under his wise guidance.
					
					 It said that the noble efforts Kim Jong Un made while wisely leading all the state affairs to let the DPRK steadily advance along its road of struggle are greatly encouraging all people in the world striving to achieve genuine independence away from all tentacles of the imperialists.
					
					 It extended congratulations once again to Kim Jong Un who has won deep trust from the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and hoped that he would accomplish the Korean revolution for the party, the revolution, the country and its people and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Won Gyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Won Gyong
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Acad., Prof., Dr. Ri Won Gyong, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and researcher at Kim Il Sung University, on Friday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Denounces U.S. for Pulling up DPRK over Non-existent Flesh Traffic
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Denounces U.S. for Pulling up DPRK over Non-existent Flesh Traffic
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Saturday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. took issue with the DPRK over non-existent flesh traffic:
					 The U.S. in the "2016 flesh traffic report" on June 30 hurt the dignified DPRK again with all sorts of fabrications. 
					
					 It is the height of impudence and the concentrated expression of its hostile policy toward the DPRK that the U.S., which tops the world in human rights abuses, flesh traffic and its sources, takes issue with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is the veritable tundra of human rights plagued by extreme human rights abuses that stun the world people.
					
					 It is a great irony that the U.S. talks about someone's non-existent "flesh traffic".
					
					 As its hostile policy toward the DPRK proved futile, the U.S. has worked hard to fake up such documents being preoccupied with the intent to divert elsewhere the international attention and bring down the DPRK's social system by way of defaming the latter's image.
					
					 The more openly the U.S. lays bare its intention to do harm to the DPRK's social system, the more strongly the latter will maintain its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force to steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to approach the DPRK from a fresh mode, away from its foolish conception of hostility and properly understanding the latter's strategic position and the trend of the times that have undergone changes.

articles.title: Answer of Spokesman for Foreign Ministry of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Answer of Spokesman for Foreign Ministry of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- An answer given by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to the question raised by KCNA on June 24 as regards the UN Security Council's accusation against the DPRK's test-fire of a medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket was distributed on June 30 as an official document of the UNSC S/2016/575.

articles.title: Congratulations to Equatorial Guinean PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Equatorial Guinean PM
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on June 30 sent a congratulatory message to Francisco Pascual Obama Asue upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea.
					 The message wished him success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Agapito Mba Mokuy upon his stay in office as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Ethiopian Youth Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Ethiopian Youth Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia headed by President Gelta Ermiyas Mathewos visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests went round the historical relics preserved with much care at the old home, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the story of his family members.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Youth Movement Museum, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: DPRK's Officials Visit KPA Tree Nursery and Stockbreeding Co-op Farm
articles.content:
DPRK's Officials Visit KPA Tree Nursery and Stockbreeding Co-op Farm
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Officials of power and economic organs including the chairpersons of the provincial, city and county people's committees across the country visited the Tree Nursery No. 122 of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Namsan Stockbreeding Cooperative Farm in Kusong City.
					 They looked round the tree nursery on Friday.
					
					 They laid flowers before the mosaic depicting smiling leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Being briefed on the tree nursery, they went round the nursery.
					
					 Earlier, they went round the Namsan Stockbreeding Cooperative Farm in Kusong City.
					
					 They learned about the feats performed by the peerlessly great persons for the development of the farm at the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 They went round the facilities for stockbreeding.

articles.title: Pyongyang Army-People Meeting Hails Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission of DPRK
articles.content:
Pyongyang Army-People Meeting Hails Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of service personnel and people in Pyongyang City took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Saturday to hail the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The meeting was attended by Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions, industrial establishments and universities, citizens, youths and students in the city, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a congratulatory report.
					
					 The reporter said Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly was a great revolutionary jubilee of historic significance in demonstrating before the whole world the dignity and national power of the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are advancing under the guidance of the ever-victorious WPK headed by Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 He stressed the need to launch an all-out charge for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK, the victory in the drive for the building of a socialist power, national reunification and the final accomplishment of the cause of the Juche revolution, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then congratulatory speeches were made by Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Army General Pak Yong Sik, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 They reiterated their will to bear in mind the great pride and honor of holding Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party and the state and remain loyal to his leadership.

articles.title: Many People Visit Venue of Art Exhibition for Class Education
articles.content:
Many People Visit Venue of Art Exhibition for Class Education
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- An art exhibition on the theme of the anti-imperialist and class education is now under way at the Pyongyang International House of Culture in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. The exhibition is visited by a lot of service personnel, officials, working people, youth and students of the Ministry of Culture, Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts and many other units.
					 Displayed there are art pieces dealing with the monstrous crimes of the U.S. imperialists, Japanese militarists and class enemies who inflicted untold misfortune and suffering on the Korean people.
					
					 Watching "Grudge-bearing Pamnamu (chestnut) Village," "Demons," "Brutes" and other art pieces showing the thrice-cursed massacres committed by the U.S. imperialist brutes and class enemies during the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War, the visitors harden their will to revenge the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 Among the paintings are "Young Casting Worker in Past," "Trying to Get a Job" and "Girlhood of Grandmother." The visitors look at them with surging indignation at the Japanese imperialists who imposed all misfortune and pain upon the Korean people after occupying Korea for over four decades and at the Japanese reactionaries who deny the crime-woven past and are working hard to evade reparation.

articles.title: Results of Premier League in DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Premier League in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Premier league football matches of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize came to an end in the DPRK.
					 The Amnokgang Team placed first by beating the Sobaeksu Team 2:1 in the June 30 men's finals, while the women's football title was taken by the Wolmido Team.
					
					 144 goals in total were scored in the premier league that lasted for 20-odd days with attendance of 11 men's and 8 women's teams.

articles.title: Japan Should Return All Looted Cultural Artefacts: DPRK Scholar
articles.content:
Japan Should Return All Looted Cultrual Artefacts: DPRK Scholar
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- It has been 100 years since the Japanese imperialists proclaimed the "regulations on preserving historical spots and relics" for the purpose of destroying and taking away Korea's cultural artefacts.
					 In this regard, Prof. and Dr. Kong Myong Song, director of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists, who had plundered Korea of its cultural artefacts from the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598), proclaimed the "regulations" on July 4, 1916 after their occupation of Korea.
					
					 And they set up such predatory machineries as "committee for survey of historical spots in Korea" to despoil Korea of its valuable cultural assets.
					
					 As a result, at least 200 royal mausoleums and 11 000 ancient tombs across the country were pillaged and damaged by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They also plundered tens of thousands of volumes of historical documents including the Chronicles of the Feudal Joson Dynasty of more than 1 800 volumes and tens of thousands of Koryo ceramics. 
					
					 According to the rough estimate, the Japanese imperialists looted hundreds of thousands of cultural artefacts during their occupation of Korea and 40 000 pieces of them are now on display at the Tokyo National Museum. They even carried to Japan the walls containing mural paintings from Koguryo tombs.
					
					 They were impudent enough to open to the public those cultural assets as Japan's "treasures" and use them as a means for money-making.
					
					 Over the past years a number of countries had returned the cultural assets they looted from other countries, but it is only the Japanese reactionaries that have justified their past wrongs and on the contrary are seeking to grab other countries' territories including Tok Islets of Korea though 70 years has passed after Japan's defeat.
					
					 Japan should face up to the trend of the times and make an apology and reparation for its past aggression and plunder against Korea and return all the cultural properties it looted.

articles.title: Ushering in Avenue to Independent Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Ushering in Avenue to Independent Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast determination of the DPRK to surely hold a great national conference for reunification and usher in an avenue to the era of independent reunification, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 The DPRK government, political parties and organizations proposed to hold a great national conference for national reunification on the 71st anniversary of liberation of Korea and organized the north side preparatory committee and sent an open letter to the authorities, political parties and organizations and individual personages of south Korea and overseas as part of practical measures.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK's patriotic measure evokes lively response at home and abroad and the international community is following the trend of the situation on the Korean peninsula that has entered a new turning phase and the Korean nation, the article goes on:
					
					 Whoever sincerely worries about the destiny of the country and hopes for national reunification will have no reason to deny the proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 Now the anti-reunification forces in south Korea insult and deny the north's proposal, branding it as "offensive of united front devoid of sincerity" and "camouflaged peace offensive inciting discord in the south."
					
					 However, it is nothing but the last-ditch wriggle of anti-reunification elements being marginalized as bubbles by the strong wave for independent reunification.
					
					 Any authorities and politicians of south Korea will have no future unless they resolutely give up sycophancy and dependence on outsiders that they have maintained under the rule by outsiders for more than a century.
					
					 If they fail to come to their senses and take responsible option, though belatedly, but obstruct reunification while selling the interests of the nation to outsiders to seek their own way-out, they will never escape punishment by history and the nation, being branded as despicable and sycophants and traitors never to be pardoned.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Unmasks U.S. True Colors as World's Worst Architect of Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Unmasks U.S. True Colors as World's Worst Architect of Nuclear Proliferation
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A Swedish institute disclosed in a recent report that the U.S. is about to invest one trillion U.S. dollars into updating its nuclear weapons in the three decades to come.
					 Noting the updating planned by Washington definitely goes against the promise made by Obama trumpeting about nuclear disarmament, the report said his idea of building "a world without nuclear weapons" is no more than a pipedream full of contradiction.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 It is the invariable ambition persistently pursued by the U.S. imperialists to dominate the world by seizing military edge with its nuclear club.
					
					 It is the present goal of Washington to create a favorable atmosphere for realizing the wild dream by occupying the whole Korean peninsula, in particular.
					
					 Irony is that Obama spouted anti-DPRK invectives that the latter "has perpetrated provocations by not only developing nukes but also proliferating them" and it is "the worst obstacle to building a world without nuclear weapons" and "its nuclear and ballistic missile programs threaten the region, the U.S. and the world." This only reminds one of a guilty party filing a suit first.
					
					 But such brigandish method of Washington can never work in this world.
					
					 With no rhetoric of turning black into white can it conceal its true colors as the world's worst mastermind of nuclear threat and proliferation.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. resorts to its reckless nuclear intimidation against the DPRK, the more vividly it will betray its true colors as the world's chief architect of nuclear threat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Politicians' Sinister Intention
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Politicians' Sinister Intention
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. political circle is saying this or that about the issue of the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea whose nutshell is that south Korea has to bear more expenses for "peace and stability."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. politicians label the U.S. forces present abroad as "apostle of peace" and are talking about some compensation. Lurking behind this is the sinister intention to calm down the mounting anti-U.S. sentiments in different parts of the world and realize the strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region at any cost by emptying the purses of the war servants and stooges.
					
					 The U.S. attempt to regard the Korean peninsula as its scapegoat for realizing the ambition for aggression is no more than a daydream that can never be realized.
					
					 If the U.S. misses the last chance for making a policy switchover in the peninsula, not understanding the change of the era, its hostile policy toward the DPRK will terminate at the crucible of a war.
					
					 We will no longer allow the national division to persist as it has steadily ruined the nation's homogeneity for more than seven decades. If the U.S. ignites a war, we will lead it to a great war for national reunification. This is the steadfast will of the iron will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea are the first sacrifice of a nuclear war to be unleashed by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. politicians should withdraw at once the imperialist aggression forces and their bases from the Korean peninsula and its vicinity, before urging their servants to cover more expenses for the upkeep of their armed forces in south Korea.

articles.title: Domestic Animal Epidemic Occurs in South Korea
articles.content:
Domestic Animal Epidemic Occurs in South Korea
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Domestic animal epidemic broke out at a stockbreeding farm house in Hanrim Township of Jeju City, Jeju Province of south Korea on June 28, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 It was reportedly confirmed that a pig bred by the house was infected with fever virus similar to the one being epidemic abroad.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic and Social Bodies Slam War Moves of Puppet Military Warmongers
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic and Social Bodies Slam War Moves of Puppet Military Warmongers
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and social organizations on July 28 held the 170th meeting for peace and disarmament in front of the building of the puppet Ministry of Defence to denounce the military war-like elements for being hell-bent on war moves.
					 The speakers referred to the fact that on June 10 the puppet ministry submitted to the "National Assembly" a bill calling for increasing defence budget 5.3 percent in 2017 over that this year.
					
					 They called for immediately stopping introducing military hardware for a preemptive attack on the north aimed at confrontation and war.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Demand Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Demand Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Kangjong Village Council, All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base and Building Peaceful Island and the Measure Council for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base in south Korea released a joint statement on June 29.
					 It recalled that the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster in its first report on probe into the truth on June 27 clarified that the ferry was carrying iron bars to the Jeju naval base.
					
					 Noting this fact was revealed two years after the occurrence of the accident, the statement said all suspicions including the linkage of the naval base construction to the ferry disaster and the "government's" responsibility should be probed, though belatedly.
					
					 Noting the fact that the ferry was transporting to the Jeju naval base iron bars, one of the key reasons for its sinking, had not been clarified by the joint investigation headquarters in its investigation results, it said there are various other suspicions that require explanation besides this.
					
					 Saying that other materials were being carried, it urged the clarification of whether they were for naval base construction or not.
					
					 It accused the "government" of showing mean behavior such as pressurizing the ad-hoc committee to stop its activities.
					
					 All truths about the ferry disaster should be thoroughly probed, it held.

articles.title: By Our Nation Itself Is Basic Idea for Korea's Reunification: Russian Media
articles.content:
By Our Nation Itself Is Basic Idea for Korea's Reunification: Russian Media
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Russian media observed the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The newspaper Bremya Peremon Plus TV on June 12 in an article said that By Our Nation Itself is the basic idea for Korea's reunification reflected in the joint declaration.
					
					 The above-said idea reflects the love for the country and the nation and the peace-loving spirit, the newspaper noted, adding that it also reflects the will of all Koreans to clear the Korean peninsula of the dark clouds of a nuclear war by the joint efforts of the nation and hand down a peaceful, prosperous reunified country to the new generation.
					
					 Posted on the internet homepage Patrioti Moskva on June 15 was an article titled "By Our Nation Itself and national reunification".
					
					 The article said the idea of By Our Nation Itself contains the awareness that the Korean nation is the driving force of national reunification and reflects the firm will to discharge its responsibility and role as the driving force of reunification and the idea calling on all Koreans to join hands and get united as the member of the one and the same nation, irrespective of ideology, social system, religious belief and political view.

articles.title: WPC Expresses Support for Korean People's Cause
articles.content:
WPC Expresses Support for Korean People's Cause
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific regional meeting of the World Peace Council (WPC) held in Katmandu, Nepal on June 21 and 22 expressed full support for the Korean people's just cause.
					 A keynote report made at the meeting accused the U.S. imperialists and their followers of moving to ignite a fresh war against the DPRK, saying that the DPRK's right to safeguard itself from the imperialists' threat should be surely supported.
					
					 The executive secretary of the WPC said that the DPRK had access to nukes for self-defence, it is a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea in order to ensure durable peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 A resolution on the Korean issue adopted at the meeting noted that to ensure durable peace on the Korean peninsula is directly related to the regional stability. It went on:
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop all joint military drills harassing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to come out to talks for replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace pact without any preconditions.
					
					 We also urge the U.S. to withdraw its forces from south Korea and Japan and dismantle all military bases in the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-10 Hailed by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-10 Hailed by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 23 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10.
					 The statement said that the DPRK successfully conducted a test-fire of Hwasong-10 under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The successful test-fire of Hwasong-10 means the great victory of Songun revolution, it noted
					
					 Socialist Korea's defence capabilities have been further bolstered up and its attack capability remarkably enhanced, it pointed out.
					
					 Saying that the real foe our nuclear force has to confront is a nuclear war itself, Kim Jong Un stressed the need to steadily bolster up the nuclear attack capability to protect the country and its people from the nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists, it said, and went on:
					
					 The successful test-fire is a strong warning sent to the defiant and war-thirsty U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the WPK, the DPRK, the Korean People's Army and all the Korean people.

articles.title: Guinean and Thai Figures Urge U.S. to Draw Lesson from Its Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
Guinean and Thai Figures Urge U.S. to Draw Lesson from Its Defeat in Korean War
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Guinean and Thai figures issued statements on June 21 and 25 in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said:
					
					 The U.S. is still working hard to ignite a war against the DPRK, far from drawing a due lesson from its defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 We strongly demand the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 Only when the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea, can Korea's independent and peaceful reunification be realized and durable peace be ensured on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, noted that the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean war and imposed untold misfortune and suffering upon the Korean nation.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The U.S. should conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and take practical measures for Korea's reunification, not seeking its hostile policy toward the latter.
					
					 I fully support the DPRK's efforts for preventing a war and reunifying the country peacefully and extend firm solidarity to the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Austrian Organization
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on June 27 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on May 3 and Nov. 3, Juche 61 (1972), clarifies the three principles of national reunification -- independence, great national unity and peaceful reunification. It also deals with the idea of realizing collaboration between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 A portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on June 27.
					 Lebedev, chief of the group, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to send a message to Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize a seminar praising the exploits of Kim Il Sung, film show and other events on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Pakistan
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Karachi on June 21 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Former Senator Amar Jit was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and the struggle of the Korean people for opening the greatest heyday in building a socialist power under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize diverse events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by German Organization
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Our People" was posted by the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture on the website of the MS Travel Company of Germany on June 27 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on Feb. 11, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the idea that commemorating July 8, anniversary of demise of the President, as the greatest national memorial day is the noblest moral obligation and firm will of all the Korean people and progressive mankind to hold the President in high esteem forever as the great leader of the cause of the Juche revolution and the father of all people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Organization as Great Master of Independent Politics
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Organization as Great Master of Independent Politics
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website on June 17 on the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il was the great master of the independent politics who deserves special record in the history of the world politics.
					
					 His political philosophy is the Juche idea being recognized by the international community as the guiding idea of the cause of human independence, it noted, and went on:
					
					 His greatest exploit is the Songun politics.
					
					 He comprehensively applied the great Songun politics and thus resolutely smashed the imperialists' anti-socialist offensive and won only victory in the ceaseless DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to building an independent new world while consistently keeping independence, peace and friendship as the basic idea of external activities.
					
					 His august name will shine forever as the one of the great master of independent politics as he wisely led the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia primero el Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Xi Jinping.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Envio a Vd. mis calurosas felicitaciones por su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC en el cuarto periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por Vd. el pueblo coreano logre nuevos y continuos exitos en los trabajos de varios dominios para la construccion y el desarrollo del Estado 
					
					La amistad China-Corea es el valioso patrimonio comun de los dos paises.
					
					La parte china esta dispuesta a ofrecer el bienestar a los dos paises y a sus pueblos al desarrollar continuamente con la parte coreana las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Formulo votos por la prosperidad de su pais, la felicidad y la tranquilidad del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 30 de junio el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					El texto sigue:
					
					Companero Mariscal:
					
					Enviando a Vd. mis sinceras y calurosas felicitaciones en relacion con que el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC fue cambiado por el Comite de Estado y Vd. fue elegido como su presidente en el cuarto periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de su pais amistoso, efectuado el 29 de junio de 2016 en Pyongyang, formulo votos por su salud y felicidad y exitos en el desempeno del nuevo cargo importante y el mayor progreso y prosperidad para el pueblo de su pais amistoso bajo la sabia direccion de Vd.
					
					Los nobles esfuerzos realizados por Vd. dirigiendo sabiamente todos los quehaceres estatales para que la RPDC pudiera avanzar a pasos firmes por su ruta de lucha estimulan mucho a todos los pueblos del mundo que luchan por lograr la independencia verdadera librandose de las garras imperialistas de todo tipo.
					
					Reiterando mis felicitaciones a Vd. que recibio las muestras de gran confianza de la APS de la RPDC, deseo que Vd. lleve a feliz termino la revolucion coreana por el partido, la revolucion, la patria, el pueblo y la independencia del mundo.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion al companero Mariscal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Ri Won Gyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Ri Won Gyong
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia primero una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ri Won Gyong, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y academico, profesor, doctor e investigador de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: MINREX condena movimientos anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX condena movimientos anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia primero con motivo de que Estados Unidos maniobra siniestramente para crear el ambiente de sancion y presion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El 30 de junio, EE.UU. celebro en la sede de la ONU junto con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos el llamado encuentro de informacion sobre la ejecucion de la ilegal sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					La organizacion de ese encuentro con las fuerzas satelites sin ninguna autorizacion del Secretariado o el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU constituye un acto sucio sin precedentes en la historia de la ONU y una burla a la sociedad internacional.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado en varias ocasiones, las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que se malemplean en siniestros objetivos politicos de una potencia y violan flagrantemente la soberania y el derecho a la vida de un Estado soberano, no pasan de ser documentos criminales privados de imparcialidad, legalidad y moralidad.
					
					Por esta razon, muchos paises dan espaldas a EE.UU. que se puso al frente de algunos paises satelites para crear el ambiente de sancion anticoreana utilizando todos los medios y metodos y el mismo Secretariado de la ONU elude dar explicaciones sobre la base legal de las referidas "resoluciones".
					
					Ya que estos documentos resultaron inefectivos, EE.UU. aplico unilateralmente crueles medidas de sancion e instiga por otra parte a Japon, el Sur de Corea y otros seguidores  a obligar y persuadir a varios paises para que rompan las normales relaciones economicas y comerciales y hasta las diplomaticas con la RPDC.
					
					Es muy natural que tales movimientos pueriles y bajos fueran ridiculizados en la arena internacional.
					
					Seria muy equivocado pensar que mediante la sancion y presion, se puede sorprender a la RPDC que avanza bajo la bandera de autofortalecimiento.
					
					La escalada de amenaza nuclear y sancion de EE.UU. no dara otro resultado que el engrandecimiento cualitativo y cuantitativo del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. de trafico de seres humanos
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. de trafico de seres humanos
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- En entrevista con la ACNC ofrecida este sabado en relacion con que Estados Unidos volvio a acusar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del problema de trafico de seres humanos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					En el llamado "informe del trafico de seres humanos de 2016" publicado el 30 de junio, EE.UU. volvio a acusar a la digna RPDC con datos inventados.
					
					Tal acusacion tan absurda de EE.UU., violador No.1 de DDHH y peor criminal y pais fuente del trafico de seres humanos, constituye una expresion coherente de su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Es precisamente EE.UU. donde se reportan sin parar los casos de violacion flagrante de DDHH que dejan consternado a todo el mundo.
					
					Tal pais esta acusando ridiculamente el inexistente "problema del trafico de seres humanos".
					
					Ya que se torna cada vez mas evidente el fracaso de su politica sobre nuestro pais, EE.UU. trata de distraer la atencion internacional al manchar la imagen de nuestro pais y se enfrasca en inventar documentos falsos como el informe mencionado con el siniestro objetivo de derrocar nuestro regimen.
					
					Cuanto mas exponga EE.UU. su intencion de acabar con nuestro regimen, tanto mas consolidaremos en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa ateniendonos mas a la linea de impulso simultaneo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Al ver correctamente la cambiada posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la tendencia de la epoca, EE.UU. debe tratarla con nuevo modo saliendo de la estupida concepcion hostil.

articles.title: Capitalinos festejan en mitin la eleccion de Kim Jong Un al cargo supremo de la RPDC
articles.content:
Capitalinos festejan en mitin la eleccion de Kim Jong Un al cargo supremo de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 2 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de militares y civiles capitalinos para festejar la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos sociales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas, empresas y universidades de la capital, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, ahora de visita en la patria, y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					Dijo que la eleccion de Kim Jong Un al puesto supremo de la Republica en el cuarto periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS es un gran jubilo revolucionario que reviste importancia historica en demostrar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la gran nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu. 
					
					Enfatizo que siempre habra victorias y glorias en el avance del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que marchan bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y del invicto Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Llamo a todos a unirse con mas firmeza en torno al Mariscal y librar la ofensiva general por la prosperidad de la RPDC, la victoria en la construccion de potencia socialista, la reunificacion de la patria y el cumplimiento definitivo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Luego pronunciaron discursos de felicitacion Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Pak Yong Sik, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron las decisiones de apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Mariscal, guardando en lo profundo del corazon el gran honor de tener al Mariscal en el puesto supremo del partido y el Estado.
